MOB 25 S MOB 25 N MOB 50 N MOB 20 E MEI 20 E TCL 25 WSW ANB 30 NE
CSG 35 SSW MCN 15 WSW MGR 35 SSW AAF.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 50 ENE MTC 20 SE MBL
30 NE MTW 20 ESE OSH 35 WNW MKE 10 SSE JVL 25 SW RFD 45 SW RFD 20
